评论概述: Wrong color and missing the lace
评论详情: I ordered the brown shirt and was sent the navy blue one instead. The shirt did not come with the lace undershirt, which makes the title of the product misleading. The fit of the top sent was true to size.

i love the way it fits the material is a little itchy but not too bad. The lace on the inside is not a secondary shirt it is instead just a chunk of lace sewn into the shirt. Which isn’t really an issue but you’re busty the lace does not like to stay out and you’ll have to adjust it.

评论概述: This is Tween Korean sizing, not US Ladies
评论详情: I loved the shirt. I would prefer it fit me. But it looks fantastic on my sz 00 daughter. Sz Large. She swiped it and said Thanks Ma!

i adore it ! the fabric isn’t the highest quality ever, but it’s definitely manageable for the price and still very soft. it’s a little tight in the sleeves and a bit in the chest area, but it’s okay. shipping was fairly fast too ! overall, 5 out of 5 stars 🎀

评论概述: not at all like the photos

doesn’t look anything like the picture and really poorly made

I like it. I like the way it fits me i didn’t know itd be that stretchy though but its still cute 10/10. Pink

Everything fine!

评论概述: Not flattering, not a good material, SEE THROUGH
评论详情: i ordered this hoping it would be a good shirt, it wasn’t flattering, the material was cheap and it was see through.

Overall I think this shirt and its details are so pretty. The texture of the shirt is a little off putting and scratchy. In the product photos I found it hard to see the flower so I took a up close picture.

This shirt is so adorable and i will be wearing it all the time. The only issue i have is that the shirt is see through so you have to wear with an undershirt. Other than that the shirt is true to size but the sleeves are a little long and the shirt goes to my hips.

I sized up and it fits really tight and the sleeves and the rest of the shirt aren't as long as the picture shows and I was really hoping for the fabric to be a little elastic/stretchy to pull the shirt down more and it's not.

It did not fit like I was hopping I got a small but fit like a extra small and very itchy and easy to shrink in the wash it looks super cute. Looks exactly like the photo it’s just uncomfortable to wear And hard to take off.
It doesn’t come with the lace btw but the top itself is super cute and it fits well
